subject: Boxing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: A genial presence in a hard-nosed sport, Mr. Steward trained more than 30 world champions, including Lennox Lewis and Evander Holyfield.
snippet: A genial presence in a hard-nosed sport, Mr. Steward trained more than 30 world champions, including Lennox Lewis and Evander Holyfield.
